What had remained dorment in Tucson for so long, was finally waking up.  He=
 had never known his more passionate side, and now, he was finally becommin=
g familliar with it.  He couldn't help but keep Talon in his embrace, and r=
eturn her kiss as passionate as those she was returning to him.  His body l=
oosens up as he now just takes what comes naturally to him.  

As gentile a=
s any Autobot would be, Tucson begins the first steps in initiating what co=
uld very well be courtship among Cybertronian Kind.  

He moves from his kn=
ees gently sitting down against a wall, as he tenderly coaxes Talon to sit =
down with him. 

"Oh, before we do anything else... I hear the hum of the v=
isual monitors..  I better shut those down temporarilly.  I don't think Lor=
d Elder or anyone would mind as long as I remember to reactivate them."

Wi=
th that he punches the codes to deactivate the visuals yet sends a message =
to Lord Elder.

" Don't worry about the monitors, I shut them off temporari=
lly, will remember to reactivate them..  Occupied for now, Tucson."
